description: Lab experiments show planets can generate water during formation, not just via comets. This suggests habitable conditions may be widespread in the galaxy, expanding possibilities for life-friendly exoplanets.
title: Planets Could Create Their Own Water While Forming, Expanding Possibilities for Habitable Worlds

description: Panda Plan, starring Jackie Chan, is a delightful blend of action, humor, and emotion, featuring a daring rescue of a panda cub. Now available on Lionsgate Play, the movie is a perfect Children’s Day watch for families everywhere.
title: Panda Plan OTT Release Date Revealed: What You Need to Know About Jackie Chan's Heartwarming Action Comedy

description: The Bengal Files, directed and written by Vivek Agnihotri, is an intense drama movie that is set to land on the digital screens. The film explores themes of politics, conspiracies, and stories from pre-partition Bengal.
title: The Bengal Files OTT Release Date Confirmed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Created by David Farr, The Night Manager is set to land on the digital screens with its second season.
title: The Night Manager Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tom Hiddleston Starrer Series Online?

description: Jurassic Park: Rebirth is an American Sci-Fi thriller film that is set to hit the digital screens soon. The film stars Scarlet Johansson and Jonathan Bailey in the lead roles.
title: Jurassic Park: Rebirth OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Kamaro 2 is a Kannada Horror film that stars Priyanka Upendra in the lead role. The film explores themes of horror, supernatural appearances, and spiritual secrets. The film is now available to stream on Sun NXT.
title: Kamaro 2 Now Available on OTT: Know Where to Watch This Sequel of Kamarottu Checkpost

description: The new docuseries featuring the real-life Marines Unit, exploring the rigorous training, emotional bonds, brotherhood and various tensions and challenges of the 31st Marine Expeditionary Unit, set in the Pacific, is reflected in the Marines Season 1.
title: Marines Season 1 Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know About This Captivating Military Docuseries

description: Rowan Atkinson returns to Netflix in Man vs Baby, a hilarious and heartwarming sequel to Man vs Bee. Launching December 11, 2025, the four-part comedy follows Trevor Bingley as he faces festive chaos, a luxury penthouse, and a baby that changes everything. Expect classic Atkinson humor, physical gags, and a dose of Christmas cheer.
title: Rowan Atkinson Returns with Chaotic Fun in Netflix’s Man vs Baby: When to Watch Online?

description: Sony has announced a new State of Play presentation for this week. The broadcast will feature games made in Japan and Asia. State of Play Japan will be livestreamed on PlayStation's YouTube channel on November 11.
title: Sony Announces State of Play Japan Broadcast for This Week: What to Expect

description: Elon Musk impressed many netizens on Tuesday after he posted a conversation with the Grok chatbot. In the conversation, the multipreneur shared an image of Lord Ganesha and asked the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to identify the deity. Not only was the chatbot able to identify the Indian God, it was also able to describe the identifying features and the regional variation of the art.
title: Elon Musk's Grok AI Recognises Lord Ganesha, Wows the Internet

description: GoPro launched three new products in India on Tuesday, including a 360-degree action camera, a lightweight action camera, and a new gimbal. Dubbed GoPro Max 2, Lit Hero, and Fluid Pro AI Gimbal, they will be sold in India via Amazon, Flipkart, Croma, and Reliance Digital. While the Max 2 is already on sale in the country, the Lit Hero action camera and the Fluid Pro AI gimbal will be available later. The three products were first launched in select markets in September.
title: GoPro Max 2, Lit Hero Launched in India With Up to 8K Video Recording, Along With Fluid Pro AI Gimbal: Price, Specifications

description: Connecting your Android phone to a Windows PC using Microsoft’s Phone Link app has several productivity and convenience benefits. It allows you to view and reply to text messages, manage notifications, make and attend calls, and access media on the Windows PC. You can also customise how Phone Link works by adjusting a few optional settings.
title: How to Link Your Android Phone With a Windows PC for Calling, Texting, and Sharing Photos

description: Apple and Japanese fashion brand Issey Miyake have launched the iPhone Pocket, a limited-edition 3D-knit accessory designed to hold an iPhone, AirPods, and small items. Made in Japan, it features a ribbed, stretchable design inspired by Issey Miyake’s signature pleats and can be handheld, tied to a bag, or worn crossbody. Priced at $149.95 (Rs. 13,300) for the short strap and $229.95 (Rs. 20,400) for the long strap, it will be available from November 14 in select global Apple Stores and online.
title: iPhone Pocket, a Limited Edition 3D Knitted iPod Sock-Style Accessory, Launched in Select Markets

description: UPI has made digital payments effortless in India, but its simplicity can sometimes lead to overspending or increased risk of fraud. Setting daily UPI limits helps users manage expenses and minimise losses from scams. Most banks allow users to set limits through their apps or NetBanking portals, while UPI Lite offers capped transactions for small, everyday payments.
title: Setting UPI Payment Limits: How to Limit the Amount You Can Send Daily for Safety

description: Finding a solid gaming laptop under Rs. 70,000 in India is now easier with brands like MSI, HP, Acer, Asus, and Lenovo offering high-performance options. Models such as the MSI GF63 Thin, HP Victus 15, Acer Nitro 5, Asus TUF Gaming A15, and Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 feature capable Intel or AMD processors, NVIDIA RTX or GTX graphics, and high-refresh-rate displays. These laptops balance gaming power, build quality, and value, making them ideal for gamers seeking smooth 1080p performance on a budget.
title: Best Gaming Laptops Under Rs 70,000 in India: MSI GF63 Thin, HP Victus 15, Acer Nitro 5, and More

description: Elon Musk’s xAI has introduced file support to its Grok-powered API, allowing developers to build apps that can upload, read, and analyse documents. The new Files API supports formats like PDF, CSV, JSON, and Python scripts, enabling multi-file conversations and code execution. Available with Grok 4 and Grok 4 Fast, it costs $10 per 1,000 tool invocations.
title: Elon Musk’s Grok AI Model Now Supports Files in API

description: Microsoft launched the Xbox Cloud Gaming feature in India on Tuesday. It allows users to play various games, like Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Hollow Knight: Silksong, Detective Dotson, The Palace on the Hill, Raji: An Ancient Epic, Overwatch 2, and more, from their iOS and Android phones, Samsung and LG smart TVs, Mac, PC, and Amazon Fire TV Stick. Users need a stable internet connection, delivering a minimum download speed of 10 Mbps, and an Xbox Game Pass subscription. Here's how you can access the new Xbox Cloud Gaming service.
title: How to Use Xbox Cloud Gaming on Mobiles, Laptops, Smart TVs, and More: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Oppo and OnePlus are expanding their Android 16 rollouts globally, bringing major upgrades to flagship phones and tablets. Oppo’s ColorOS 16, now reaching devices like the Find X8, Find N5, and Find N3 series, introduces smoother animations, improved performance, and enhanced AI tools, including Gemini Live integration. OnePlus’s OxygenOS 16 update, rolling out to models such as the OnePlus 13, 12, and Open, debuts a translucent design, advanced customisation options, and new AI-powered features across the interface and system apps.
title: Oppo, OnePlus Start Global Android 16 Rollout with ColorOS 16 and OxygenOS 16 Updates

description: Sony has announced that Ghost of Yotei has sold 3.3 million copies in 32 days since it launched on October 2. Sony confirmed the sales figure during its second-quarter FY 2025 earnings call. The PlayStation parent also confirmed that the PS5 had sold 3.9 million units in the quarter.
title: Ghost of Yotei Sells 3.3 Million Copies in a Month, PS5 Sales Near 85 Million Units

description: YouTube has started rolling out a new 'Ask' button. This feature, powered by Gemini, allows users to ask questions about the video they are watching. It is currently available for English videos and for users aged 18 and above in the US, Canada, New Zealand, and India. It's accessible via Android, iOS, and desktop browsers.
title: YouTube's New 'Ask' Button Uses Gemini to Get Instant Video Answers

description: Acerpure Nitro Z series 100-inch QLED TV has been launched in India. It runs on Google TV and has a 100-inch panel with a 144Hz refresh rate. The display supports Dolby Vision and HDR 10 content. The speaker unit is backed by Dolby Atmos audio with 60W output. It packs 3GB of RAM and 32GB of storage. The Acerpure Nitro Z Series 100-inch QLED TV will go on sale through Flipkart.
title: Acerpure Nitro Z Series 100-Inch QLED TV Launched in India With 144Hz Refresh Rate, Dolby Atmos Audio

description: Microsoft has discovered a new vulnerability, called Whisper Leak, that reportedly affects most server-based AI chatbots, including ChatGPT and Gemini. The flaw enables attackers to infer conversation topics through side-channel attacks by analysing encrypted network traffic metadata. Microsoft says it worked with vendors like OpenAI, Mistral, and xAI to deploy mitigations and strengthen user privacy protections.
title: Microsoft Discovers Vulnerability That Lets Hackers See ChatGPT and Gemini’s Conversation Topics

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series is expected to launch in February 2026 as the successor to this year's Galaxy S25 lineup. While the features and pricing details of the handsets are still under wraps, their specifications have been surfacing online for months. Now, a report citing industry sources suggests that the Galaxy S26 Ultra, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 could support faster wireless charging. Moreover, the dimensions of the three handsets have surfaced online, revealing that the vanilla model could sport a larger display than the Galaxy S25.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Could Launch With Faster Wireless Charging Support; Display Sizes Leaked

description: SenseTime has released two open-source AI models, SenseNova-SI-InternVL3-2B and 8B, claiming they outperform OpenAI’s GPT-5 and Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro in spatial intelligence. The models reportedly excel at understanding 3D object relationships and motion, crucial for robotics and mapping. Available on Hugging Face under Apache 2.0 license, detailed technical documentation is expected soon.
title: SenseTime's Open-Source SenseNova-SI AI Model Said to Outperform GPT-5, Gemini 2.5 Pro in Spatial Intelligence

description: Bitcoin maintained its footing above the $105,000 (roughly Rs. 93.8 lakh) level on Tuesday, supported by institutional inflows and easing macroeconomic headwinds. Renewed optimism around US crypto regulation and signs of whale accumulation have bolstered market sentiment. Ethereum traded slightly lower at $3,580 (roughly Rs. 3.1 lakh), while altcoins showed mixed movement. Analysts say improving liquidity and investor confidence could sustain Bitcoin’s base through mid-November.
title: Bitcoin Holds Above $105,000 as Institutional Demand and Regulatory Progress Lift Sentiment

description: Google reportedly previewed its Nano Banana 2 AI model, which brings improvements in colouring precision, prompt understanding, and visual accuracy. The company is also working on several other AI projects, including the Gemini 3 models, an autonomous web-browsing agent, Jarvis, on-device Night Sight Video for Pixel 11, and general-purpose Workspace AI agents, marking an expansive push across its AI ecosystem.
title: From Nano Banana 2 to Gemini 3 Pro: Five Major AI Projects Google is Working On Right Now

description: Google is set to release the November 2025 Pixel update soon, following a brief Verizon leak that revealed key details. The update is said to include the latest Android security patch, stability improvements, and fixes for audio issues, charging performance, and camera colour issues. Build numbers BP3A.251105.015 and BD3A.251105.010.E1 are said to apply to most models, including the Pixel 8, Pixel 9, and Pixel 10 series. While no new features were confirmed, a minor Pixel Feature Drop may accompany the rollout, which is expected to begin within a few days.
title: Google Pixel Phones to Get November 2025 Update Soon, Details Leak Online

description: Starting March 1, next year, the Google Play Store will show warnings on app listings that cause excessive battery drain. The Android apps that keep devices awake for a longer time will also be excluded from the prominent discovery surfaces, such as recommendations. A user session is considered excessive when it involves more than 2 cumulative hours of non-exempt wake locks within 24 hours. An app will be flagged for poor performance if more than 5 percent of its user sessions in 28 days exceed this threshold. In such cases, developers will be notified.
title: Google Play Store to Show Warnings on Apps Causing Excessive Battery Drain

description: Oppo Reno 14F 5G Star Wars Edition is scheduled to launch in Brazil as a special edition of the Reno 14F 5G, which was unveiled in select markets earlier this year. While its features are still under wraps, it is expected to ship with similar specifications as the standard edition. As per the dedicated microsite on the Oppo Mexico website, the handset will be launched with a special collector's edition box, which will also feature a Death Star II phone stand and a Darth Vader SIM ejector tool.
title: Oppo Reno 14F 5G Star Wars Edition Launch Date Set For Mid-November

description: Bethesda director Todd Howard has said that The Elder Scrolls 6 is “still a long way off.” The RPG was announced in 2018 and is currently in development at the studio. Howard said that Bethesda was working on the game every day, and even held a playtest recently.
title: The Elder Scrolls 6 Is 'Still a Long Way Off', Says Bethesda Director Todd Howard

description: WhatsApp has long been rumoured to be developing a usernames feature. In recent weeks, the Meta-owned instant messaging platform has taken steps towards its rollout by testing the ability to reserve usernames before the introduction of the full username system. WhatsApp is now reportedly developing a new feature for its Android app, which will let users select the same usernames they use on other apps under Meta’s umbrella, such as Facebook and Instagram.
title: WhatsApp for Android May Let Users Reserve Same Usernames Used on Facebook and Instagram

description: Apple has delayed its plans to launch the successor to the iPhone Air next year, according to a report. The handset is touted as Apple's most ambitious smartphone in years, but has reportedly failed to meet sales numbers. Consequently, the company is scaling back its shipments and production volume. While its 2026 launch will not happen, there is no word if the entire 'Air' project has been shelved.
title: Apple Reportedly Delays Launch of iPhone Air Successor Due to Poor Sales of First-Generation Model

description: Google Meet users can now access the complete emoji library for in-meeting reactions. Earlier, Google Meet offered a limited set of just nine basic emoji reactions for users during calls. The latest update will give participants a broader range of expressive options to increase engagement during the meetings. The feature will be available by default on the web and Android. On iOS, full emoji support is confirmed to be added at a later point in time.
title: Google Meet Finally Adds Support for Full Emoji Library to Enhance In-Call Reactions

description: Microsoft has finally launched Xbox Cloud Gaming in India. The service was previously only available in beta in select countries. Cloud gaming support will be available with an Xbox Game Pass subscription, allowing players to stream select Xbox games off the cloud without an Xbox console.
title: Microsoft Launches Xbox Cloud Gaming in India: Here's How You Can Start Cloud Streaming Games

description: The Motorola Edge 70 Ultra has been listing on a benchmarking website ahead of its anticipated debut. It is listed with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset, which is yet to be announced by Qualcomm. The handset may come with 16GB of RAM and Adreno 829 GPU, running on Android 16. In the Geekbench 6.5.0 for Android AArch64 benchmarking test, it registered single and multi-core scores of 2,636 and 7,475 points, respectively.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Allegedly Surfaces on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro and Reno 15 have been listed on the Geekbench benchmarking platform, revealing their key specifications. The handsets, which are going to launch in China on November 17 at 7pm local time (4:30pm IST), could be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chip, paired with 16GB of RAM and Mali GPU. The two phones could be available in the country via the company's online store. Moreover, it might ship with the latest version of Android. The Oppo Reno 15 lineup will succeed the Reno 14 series.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Might Feature the Same MediaTek Dimensity Chip as its Predecessor

description: Samsung Galaxy smartphones were reportedly exposed to a spyware campaign called Landfall for over a year. The malware spread through infected image files shared on social media, exploiting a zero-day flaw in Samsung’s image-processing library. Targeting Galaxy S22, S23, S24, Z Fold 4, and Z Flip 4 models, it allowed attackers to steal data. Samsung patched the vulnerability in April 2025.
title: Samsung Galaxy Smartphones Targeted By Spyware Landfall for Over a Year

description: Microsoft appears to be testing haptic feedback for Windows 11, as discovered in preview build 26220.7070. A hidden “Haptic signals” option was found with controls for vibration strength. The feature is expected to work on laptops with haptic trackpads, such as the Microsoft Surface 7 and Surface Studio 2, providing subtle feedback during actions like snapping windows or dragging files. Though not yet active, this feature could make Windows 11 more tactile and responsive when it rolls out to supported devices.
title: Windows 11 May Add Haptic Feedback for Trackpads, Reportedly Spotted in Latest Build

description: iPhone 20 lineup, which will reportedly be launched in 2027 by the Cupertino company, could carry an under-display selfie camera, according to a tipster. This comes soon after a report highlighted that the tech giant is planning to equip next year's purported iPhone 18 Pro models with in-display Face ID sensors, thanks to the hole in active area (HIAA) technology. If this is true, it would mark a shift in the company's design philosophy, as the current iPhone models feature a pill-shaped camera cutout on the front.
title: iPhone 20 Series Tipped to Launch With an Under Display Selfie Camera in 2027

description: Apple is preparing to launch its next-generation M5 Macs throughout 2026, starting with the MacBook Air and MacBook Pro early in the year. According to Mark Gurman, the Mac Mini and Mac Studio will follow around mid-2026, featuring M5, M5 Pro, M5 Max, and M5 Ultra chips. While the Mac Studio’s M5 Ultra may delay its release, the Mac Mini could arrive sooner. Despite this staggered timeline, all M5 Macs are expected to be available before the end of 2026.
title: Apple's M5 Mac Mini and Mac Studio Expected to Launch by Mid-2026: Mark Gurman

description: The ZTE Blade V80 Vita could launch soon. Ahead of the official announcement, an alleged render of the phone surfaced online. The ZTE Blade V80 Vita could draw design inspirations from Apple's latest iPhone 17 series. The phone is shown in a blue colour option with a triple rear camera setup
title: ZTE Blade V80 Vita Leaked Render Suggests Design Similar to iPhone 17 Pro

description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series is rumoured to be launched early next year. Ahead of their anticipated debut, CAD renders of the purported Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26+ have surfaced, revealing all of the design changes. As per a report, both handsets will feature a rear panel similar to the Galaxy S25 Edge, with a raised camera deco housing the triple sensors. Both models are expected to be marginally taller, wider, and thicker than their predecessors.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26+ CAD Renders Reportedly Reveal Raised Camera Island, Other Design Changes

description: Lava Agni 4 is scheduled to go official in India on November 20. Ahead of its anticipated debut, official key specifications of the Lava Agni 3 successor have been leaked by a tipster. It is said to be equipped with a 1.5K-resolution display that supports up to 120Hz. The upcoming handset could debut with a customisable action key and a triple rear camera system, headlined by a 50-megapixel main sensor.
title: Lava Agni 4 Specifications Allegedly Leaked Ahead of India Launch; to Come With a Customisable Action Key

description: Screen sharing is an incredibly useful tool, coming in handy during presentations, watching content on a larger screen, showing off photos from your recent vacation, or helping a loved one troubleshoot their device. Thus, screen sharing is a powerful tool for communication and collaboration. So, if you’ve ever wanted to share your iPhone screen but could not figure out how to do so, our step-by-step guide will come to your assistance.
title: How To Share Screen On iPhone: A Step-by-Step Guide
